long_description: Carry your groceries home in the recycled, woven polypropylene REI Reusable Shopping Tote. It's an awesome alternative answer to the question, ''Paper or plastic?''. Double webbing handles offer carrying options: the long handles fit over your shoulder and the short handles let you carry the bag at your side. Empty bag stands on its own for convenient loading. Woven polypropylene is lightweight, yet highly durable to withstand lots of use; easily wipeable for a quick cleaning. The REI Reusable Shopping Tote is made from recycled materials and can be recycled at the end of its life.
short_description: Carry your groceries home in the recycled, woven polypropylene REI Reusable Shopping Tote. It's an awesome alternative answer to the question, ''Paper or plastic?''.
product_group: Styles To Publish In Hidden State
